name: zip-compressor
title: ZIP Archive Compressor
description: Compress files and folders to ZIP archives
content:
Overview

This application compresses files and folders into ZIP archives using standard ZIP compression. It works with both individual files and entire directories, preserving the directory structure.

Features

  • Compress single files or entire directories
  • Display compression statistics and ratios
  • Preserve directory structure in archives
  • No external dependencies required (uses Python stdlib)
  • Calculate space savings from compression

Parameters

  • Input Path: Select a file or folder from stash to compress
  • Output File: Specify the name and location for the ZIP archive

Output

The application creates a compressed ZIP archive containing all files from the input path. Compression statistics including ratios and space savings are displayed in the job logs.

Use Cases

  • Create compressed backups of data
  • Reduce file sizes for storage or transfer
  • Package multiple files for distribution
  • Archive project directories
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python "prod_apps/python/zip_compressor.py" "${inputPath}" -o "${outputFile}"
